name: get_weather
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool weather_with_ai.
Tool description: Global weather forecast powered by Artificial Intelligence.
API description: Fetch weather information including current, hourly, and daily data for a specific location.

version.description: The version of the API to be used.

unit.description: Unit of temperature ('F' for Fahrenheit, 'C' for Celsius, or default 'K' for Kelvin). Defaults to None.
